The UK remains committed to multilateral disarmament and our shared long-term goal of a world without nuclear weapons. The best & only credible way to get there is the gradual, multilateral, negotiated, step-by-step approach within the framework of the Non-Proliferation Treaty

We’ll maintain only the minimum destructive power needed to guarantee our nuclear deterrent remains credible & effective. But we must adapt to realities of a worsening global security environment & place as much emphasis on the ‘credible’ part of our deterrent as the ‘minimum’

We intend to maintain the UK’s nuclear deterrent, for as long as we need it, as the ultimate guarantee of our security & that of our @NATO Allies. We are equally clear that we remain committed to, and will actively pursue, the long-term goal of a world without nuclear weapons
